title: Bangle Bear: The Tale of a Tailless Cat
description: Bangle Bear is an adventurous story of an adopted tailless cat. Within the pages, Bear teaches her human pets what 'cat time' is, that presents are a good thing, and any time is second breakfast. You will discover cats have many interests; the odd places they sleep; are cats truely politicians, and what snacks to share. The tender moments Bear expresses love and devotion to her family members. You will want to share. . . . .
author: Martha Steward
